Client for the Open Citations Corpus

## Install

Development version

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/citecorp")
```

```{r}
library("citecorp")
```

## Open citations methods

```{r}
oc_doi2ids("10.1097/igc.0000000000000609")
oc_pmid2ids("26645990")
oc_pmcid2ids("PMC4679344")
```
